pullRequest.title: MINOR: Fix typo and rephrase content in docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
fix typo: atleast -> at least
add missing -- to be consistent
rephrase a sentence, to make it more clear:

before: LinkedIn is currently running JDK 1.8 u5 (looking to upgrade to a newer version) with the G1 collector
It will misguide the users to use JDK 1.8 u5, while the JDK 1.8 u251 is already released, which will include many important bug fixes. I did some rephrase as below:
after: At the time when we write this, LinkedIn is running JDK 1.8 u5 (looking to upgrade to a newer version) with the G1 collector
Committer Checklist (excluded from commit message)

 Verify design and implementation
 Verify test coverage and CI build status
 Verify documentation (including upgrade notes)

commit.message:
fix typo and rephrase doc content

1. fix typo: atleast -> at least
2. add missing --
3. rephrase a sentence, to make it more clear

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -676,7 +676,7 @@

6.4 Java Version

From a security perspective, we recommend you use the latest released version of JDK 1.8 as older freely available versions have disclosed security vulnerabilities. - LinkedIn is currently running JDK 1.8 u5 (looking to upgrade to a newer version) with the G1 collector.
